scripts.test: npm run lab && SENECA_CACHE_PLUGIN=cache npm run lab && SENECA_CACHE_PLUGIN=redis-cache npm run lab
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm i && npm test
scripts.repo-publish: npm run clean && npm install --registry http://registry.npmjs.org && npm run repo-publish-quick
scripts.repo-publish-quick: npm run prettier && npm test && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --access public
